languages.text: "Господин Руолдо распорядился заменить мои члены перед тем, как забрал меня с родной планеты. Это было давно. Я уже забыл, какова моя земля на ощупь".
"Lord Ruoldo had my limbs replaced before he took me from my home planet. It was so long ago, I have since forgotten what my land is like to the touch."
languages.original_text: "Господин Руолдо распорядился заменить мои члены перед тем, как забрал меня с родной планеты. Это было давно. Я уже забыл, какова моя земля на ощупь".

traits.locale_text: "Lord Ruoldo had my limbs replaced before he took me from my home planet. It was so long ago, I have since forgotten what my land is like to the touch."
"Lord Ruoldo had them installed before he took me from my home planet. It was so long ago, I have since forgotten what my land is like to the touch."
"Lord Ruoldo had my limbs replaced before he took me from my home planet. It was so long ago, I have since forgotten what my land is like to the touch."
"Lord Ruoldo had them installed before he took me from my home planet. It was so long ago, I have since forgotten what my land is like to the touch."
"Lord Ruoldo had my limbs replaced before he took me from my home planet. It was so long ago, I have since forgotten what my land is like to the touch."
"Lord Ruoldo had my limbs replaced before he took me from my home planet. It was so long ago, I have since forgotten what my land is like to the touch."
"Lord Ruoldo had my limbs replaced before he took me from my home planet. It was so long ago, I have since forgotten what my land is like to the touch."

languages.text: “罗尔多大人将我从故乡带走之前，把我的身体换成了这些植入物。那已经是很久以前的事情了，我已经忘记了故土的触感。”
languages.original_text: "Lord Ruoldo had my limbs replaced before he took me from my home planet. It was so long ago, I have since forgotten what my land is like to the touch."

traits.locale_text: “罗尔多大人将我从故乡带走之前，把我的身体换成了这些植入物。那已经是很久以前的事情了，我已经忘记了故土的触感。”

languages.text: «Lord Ruoldo hizo sustituir mis extremidades antes de sacarme de mi planeta. Hace ya tanto tiempo de eso que he olvidado las sensaciones táctiles de mi tierra natal».
languages.original_text: "Lord Ruoldo had my limbs replaced before he took me from my home planet. It was so long ago, I have since forgotten what my land is like to the touch."

traits.locale_text: «Lord Ruoldo hizo sustituir mis extremidades antes de sacarme de mi planeta. Hace ya tanto tiempo de eso que he olvidado las sensaciones táctiles de mi tierra natal».

languages.text: "Lord Ruoldo beni gezegenimden almadan önce kaslarımı değiştirtmişti. O kadar uzun zaman oldu ki o günden beri yurdumun elimde uyandırdığı hissi bile unuttum."
languages.original_text: "Lord Ruoldo had my limbs replaced before he took me from my home planet. It was so long ago, I have since forgotten what my land is like to the touch."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Ruoldo beni gezegenimden almadan önce kaslarımı değiştirtmişti. O kadar uzun zaman oldu ki o günden beri yurdumun elimde uyandırdığı hissi bile unuttum."

languages.text: 「ルオルド様がわしを母星から連れてくる前に手を取り替えさせました。かなり昔のことなので、以来、わしの故郷の手触りがどんなだったか忘れました」
languages.original_text: "Lord Ruoldo had my limbs replaced before he took me from my home planet. It was so long ago, I have since forgotten what my land is like to the touch."

traits.locale_text: 「ルオルド様がわしを母星から連れてくる前にインプラントを装着させました。かなり昔のことなので、以来、わしの故郷の手触りがどんなだったか忘れました」

languages.text: « Le seigneur Ruoldo a fait remplacer mes membres avant de me faire quitter ma planète natale. C'était il y a tellement longtemps que j'en ai oublié le toucher de mon foyer. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Ruoldo had my limbs replaced before he took me from my home planet. It was so long ago, I have since forgotten what my land is like to the touch."

traits.locale_text: « Le seigneur Ruoldo a fait remplacer mes membres avant de me faire quitter ma planète natale. C'était il y a tellement longtemps que j'en ai oublié le toucher de mon foyer. »

languages.text: "Lord Ruoldo ließ meine Gliedmaßen reparieren, ehe er mich von meinem Heimatplaneten holte. Das ist so lange her, dass ich schon längst vergessen habe, wie mein Land sich anfühlt."
languages.original_text: "Lord Ruoldo had my limbs replaced before he took me from my home planet. It was so long ago, I have since forgotten what my land is like to the touch."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Ruoldo ließ meine Gliedmaßen reparieren, ehe er mich von meinem Heimatplaneten holte. Das ist so lange her, dass ich schon längst vergessen habe, wie mein Land sich anfühlt."
